SAMRAI::tbox

Base Toolbox Classes

These classes provide miscellaneous low-level functionality for the SAMRAI framework. These include complex, boolean, string type support, a simple list class, IEEE floating point operation management, and parallel I/O support for generating log files and error reporting.

  • SAMRAI::tbox::Complex
  • SAMRAI::tbox::IEEE
  • SAMRAI::tbox::List
  • SAMRAI::tbox::MathUtilities
  • SAMRAI::tbox::PIO
  • SAMRAI::tbox::ParallelBuffer
  • SAMRAI::tbox::SAMRAIManager
  • SAMRAI::tbox::ShutdownRegistry
  • SAMRAI::tbox::String
  • SAMRAI::tbox::Tracer
  • SAMRAI::tbox::Utilities
